Feature.Description: This is a test feature to generically test Unobservable commands. It specifies various unobservable commands and returns defined answers to validate against. We provide three different commands for testing concurrent situations. They accept an integer as Command Parameter as upper limit for in iteration. The Server should iterate over this number, starting at 0 until NumberIterations (including) and return the final count as Integer. By that we produce an predictable output/return which could be easily tested.

Command.Description: Unbservable iteration no. 1, running NumberIterations times and returning the current count as intermediate result.

Parameter.Description: Number of Iterations of Unbservable Command 1.

Response.Description: Iteration1 Response: An Integer, containing the last Count.
